name: Super Gelli
description:
2D Platformer for the First Gelli Jam

jump, avoid enemys and obstacles, colect the coins and open the door!

Can you beat the 5 levels?

WASD or Arrows to move!

SPACE for Jump!!

Main Song: Funny Bit - By David Renda
